snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include Internet technologies spreading into more industries, which Web sites share what information and the latest...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include Internet technologies spreading into more industries, which Web sites share what information and the latest iPhone bug.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Tech Design Comics and Artificial Intelligence Money
